ERROR_FILE_DELETE: An error occurred while deleting a file or folder
ERROR_FILE_UPLOAD: An error occurred while uploading the file or folder
DIALOG_PANIC_MESSAGE: A fatal error has occured, nobody will help you! Please erase your entire hard-drive and throw away your machine!
INPUTDIALOG_TITLE: Enter the name of the folder
SETTINGS_LOCALE_DESCRIPTION: Choose your language in which to display Nefele's menus, messages and notifications.
SETTINGS_TRANSFERS_DESCRIPTION: Choose the maximum number of simultaneous downloads and uploads.
SETTINGS_SHARED_DESCRIPTION: Choose whether to share and sync your cloud with other offline devices.
SETTINGS_ADVANCED_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Do you really want to apply changes? This action will be irreversible, changes will be applied on the next reboot.
ARCHIVE_ERROR_DIALOG_REQUEST_SYNC: Something went wrong in synchronization. Please try again later
ARCHIVE_DIALOG_FILE_INVALID: The path must be a file
ARCHIVE_DIALOG_FOLDER_NOTSELECTED: The folder has not been selected
ARCHIVE_DIALOG_FOLDER_INVALID: The path must be a folder
ARCHIVE_DIALOG_REQUEST_SYNC: Are you sure you want to share this folder?
HOME_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to quit from Nefele?
SYSTEM_TRAY_ERROR: System tray is not supported by the system.
TRANSFERVIEWER_TRANSFER_NULL: No download or upload in progress now
DRIVEMANAGER_DESCRIPTION: Add, remove or change your drive settings.
SETTINGS_DRIVE_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Do you really want to delete this Drive? This action could be irreversible
SETTINGS_DRIVE_ERROR_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: This Drive contains data so it cannot be deleted, you can still disable it at any time from the settings
WIZARD_TERMS: I accept the terms of use of the service and I declare that I have read the information on the processing of my personal data.
WIZARD_FIRST_CLOUD: Add your first Cloud to Nefele
WIZARD_FIRST_CLOUD_DESCRIPTION: Follow the wizard to add your first storage space.
CLOUDHELPER_TITLE: Select a Drive Service to insert on Nefele
CLOUDHELPER_DIALOG_ERROR_LOGIN: An error occurred while initializing the driver
CLOUDHELPER_FORM_NAME: Enter an Alias for your Cloud Service
CLOUDHELPER_FORM_QUOTA: Choose how much space you want to dedicate to Nefele
CLOUDHELPER_FORM_DIALOG: Do you really want to proceed? The assigned alias will not be editable
CLOUDHELPER_FORM_DIALOG_EMPTY_NAME: The alias cannot be an empty string
DROPBOX_PROVIDER_ADVISE: Enter the authorization code you received from Dropbox
